Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time physics, procedural world generation, and cross-platform support. Players can mine resources, build structures, and trade with others while managing fuel, temperature, and inventory. The game includes a comprehensive save system with cloud synchronization, admin tools for server management, and mobile-optimized controls. Built with HTML5 Canvas, MQTT for networking, and IndexedDB for local storage.
